mapper.select:
SELECT users.id,
user_basic_details.age, user_basic_details.sex, user_basic_details.name,
user_required_details.height, user_required_details.residence, user_required_details.occupation, user_required_details.annual_income, user_required_details.marital_status, user_required_details.desire_to_marry, user_required_details.holiday, user_required_details.smoking, user_required_details.housemate,
user_free_details.figure, user_free_details.blood_type, user_free_details.birth_place, user_free_details.educational, user_free_details.sibling, user_free_details.school_name, user_free_details.job_name, user_free_details.have_children, user_free_details.desire_to_getchild, user_free_details.housework, user_free_details.time_to_meet, user_free_details.payment, user_free_details.sociability, user_free_details.alcohol, user_free_details.hobby_one, user_free_details.hobby_two, user_free_details.hobby_three, user_free_details.vaccination,
residences.residence AS residence_str, occupations.occupation AS occupation_str, annual_incomes.annual_income AS annual_income_str, marital_statuses.marital_status AS marital_str, desire_to_marries.desire_to_marry AS desire_to_marry_str, holidays.holiday AS holiday_str, smokings.smoking AS smoking_str, housemates.housemate AS housemate_str,
figures.figure AS figure_str, blood_types.blood_type AS blood_type_str, birth_places.birth_place AS birth_place_str, educationals.educational AS educational_str, siblings.sibling AS sibling_str, have_childrens.have_children AS have_children_str, desire_to_getchilds.desire_to_getchild AS desire_to_getochild_str, houseworks.housework AS housework_str, time_to_meets.time_to_meet AS time_to_meet_str, payments.payment AS payment_str, sociabilities.sociability AS sociabilitty_str, alcohols.alcohol AS alcohol_str, hobby_one, hobby_two, hobby_three, vaccinations.vaccination AS vaccination_str,
user_texts.one_word AS one_word, user_texts.self_introduction AS self_introduction,
imgs.img
FROM users LEFT JOIN user_basic_details ON users.id = user_basic_details.id LEFT JOIN user_free_details ON users.id = user_free_details.id LEFT JOIN user_required_details ON users.id = user_required_details.id LEFT JOIN user_texts ON users.id = user_texts.id LEFT JOIN imgs ON users.id = imgs.id
LEFT JOIN residences ON user_required_details.residence = residences.id LEFT JOIN occupations ON user_required_details.occupation = occupations.id LEFT JOIN annual_incomes ON user_required_details.annual_income = annual_incomes.id LEFT JOIN marital_statuses ON user_required_details.marital_status = marital_statuses.id LEFT JOIN desire_to_marries ON user_required_details.desire_to_marry = desire_to_marries.id LEFT JOIN holidays ON user_required_details.holiday = holidays.id LEFT JOIN smokings ON user_required_details.smoking = smokings.id LEFT JOIN housemates ON user_required_details.housemate = housemates.id
LEFT JOIN figures ON user_free_details.figure = figures.id LEFT JOIN blood_types ON user_free_details.blood_type = blood_types.id LEFT JOIN birth_places ON user_free_details.birth_place = birth_places.id LEFT JOIN educationals ON user_free_details.educational = educationals.id LEFT JOIN siblings ON user_free_details.sibling = siblings.id LEFT JOIN have_childrens ON user_free_details.have_children = have_childrens.id LEFT JOIN desire_to_getchilds ON user_free_details.desire_to_getchild = desire_to_getchilds.id LEFT JOIN houseworks ON user_free_details.housework = houseworks.id LEFT JOIN time_to_meets ON user_free_details.time_to_meet = time_to_meets.id LEFT JOIN payments ON user_free_details.payment = payments.id LEFT JOIN sociabilities ON user_free_details.sociability = sociabilities.id LEFT JOIN alcohols ON user_free_details.alcohol = alcohols.id LEFT JOIN vaccinations ON user_free_details.vaccination = vaccinations.id
user_basic_details.sex = 2 user_basic_details.sex = 1
ORDER BY id DESC
